p: In our previous research, we found that flavonoid glycoside is transformed into flavonoid aglycone through hydrolysis during SF processing. Moreover, hydroxycinnamoylquinic acids are broken down after SF (Wang S etÂ al. 2014). However, the link between the changes in the compounds and the changes in the antioxidant activity of Chrysanthemum is still not clear. In future studies, these different components will be isolated, and their antioxidant activity will be further studied.
